body:
Comment 7: 
Please try

cd $GOROOT/src
hg pull
hg update default
./all.bash

and see if that helps.  We have changed this code a bit
since the release you are running, and while I can't see how
it would help, I also can't see how the error you are seeing
could possibly happen, so it is worth a shot.  :-)

Thanks.
Russ
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
